name: The Clock of Us
description:
Fight the negative feelings of rage, sadness and panic with Love! 

Dont let them spoil your time!

z + Arrow to push the ball

x+ Up or Down to change lanes

All assets where made by me.

I made the music in https://onlinesequencer.net/ and use some of the drum sounds for sound effects.
Happy Holydays everyone!


-New downloadable Windows Version!

This game was made for the Extra Credits Holiday Jam 2018
